scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev:products" "npm run dev:pandas" "npm run dev:users"
scripts.dev:products: cd products && npm i && cargo rover dev --name products --command 'npm run start' --schema products.graphql --url http://localhost:4002
scripts.dev:pandas: cd pandas && npm i && cargo rover dev --name pandas --command 'npm run start' --schema pandas.graphql --url http://localhost:4003
scripts.dev:users: cd users && npm i && cargo rover dev --name users --command 'npm run start' --schema users.graphql --url http://localhost:4001
